tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE renewable_energy_components (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  component_name VARCHAR(50),
  component_type VARCHAR(50),
  quantity INT,
  supplier_name VARCHAR(50),
  price DECIMAL(10,2)
)

CREATE TABLE solar_panels (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    brand VARCHAR(255),
    power_output DECIMAL,
    price DECIMAL,
    quantity INT
);

CREATE TABLE batteries (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    brand VARCHAR(255),
    capacity DECIMAL,
    price DECIMAL,
    quantity INT
);

CREATE TABLE solar_panels (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    brand VARCHAR(50),
    capacity DECIMAL,
    price DECIMAL,
    efficiency DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE batteries (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    brand VARCHAR(50),
    capacity DECIMAL,
    price DECIMAL,
    type VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE suppliers (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50),
    contact VARCHAR(20),
    address VARCHAR(100),
    email VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE procurement (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    supplier_id INT,
    component_id INT,
    quantity INT,
    cost DECIMAL,
    order_date DATE
);
